edu.illinois.library.cantaloupe.request

Class Region

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.illinois.library.cantaloupe.request.Region

  • public class Region
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates the "region" component of an IIIF request URI.
    See Also:
    IIIF Image API 2.0
